meeting_summaries.transcript_preview:
Sarah: Welcome everyone. Let's plan our Q4 holiday campaign.

Tom: I've analyzed last year's data. Email campaigns had 24% open rate. Social media ads performed better at 3.2% CTR.

Emma: We should focus budget on Instagram and TikTok. Our demographic is most active there.

Sarah: Agreed. What's the creative concept?

Tom: I propose "Your Year, Elevated" as the tagline. Focuses on personal achievement and our product helping them succeed.

Emma: Love it. We can create user-generated content aro

summary.tldr: The team reviewed the first week of the Q4 holiday campaign, noting strong email and social media (Instagram, TikTok) performance exceeding initial targets. Conversions are on track to meet the revenue goal, and influencer partnerships are showing good reach. Twitter ads are underperforming and will be reallocated.

context_connections.connection: Follow-up on email open rates from the previous campaign planning meeting.
context_connections.reference: Email campaigns had 24% open rate (last year's data mentioned in previous meeting).

context_connections.connection: Follow-up on social media ad performance from the previous campaign planning meeting.
context_connections.reference: Social media ads performed better at 3.2% CTR (last year's data mentioned in previous meeting).

context_connections.connection: Follow-up on the influencer partnership strategy decided in the previous meeting.
context_connections.reference: Influencer partnerships were decided to be commission-based in the previous meeting.

context_connections.connection: Follow-up on the user-generated content initiative decided in the previous meeting.
context_connections.reference: User-generated content was discussed as a way to amplify the campaign theme in the previous meeting.

context_connections.connection: Confirmation of campaign budget reallocation, stemming from previous discussion on budget focus.
context_connections.reference: Campaign budget was set at $150K and focus was on Instagram/TikTok in the previous meeting.

decisions.decision: Reallocate Twitter ads budget to Instagram.
decisions.context: Twitter ads are underperforming (1.2% CTR).

decisions.decision: Create a landing page showcasing all user-generated content submissions.
decisions.context: To amplify user-generated content, boost credibility, and encourage more submissions.

action_items.task: Make the Twitter ads budget reallocation to Instagram.
Create a landing page showcasing all user-generated content submissions.

key_points: Review of week one campaign results.
Email campaign exceeded expectations (31% open rate, 4.8% CTR).
TikTok engagement is high despite slightly lower CTR (2.9%).
Conversion rate is 2.1%, on track for $500K revenue target.
Influencer partnerships are active and reaching 2M people.
User-generated content is being submitted (47 so far) and featured on Instagram stories.
Need to amplify user-generated content and encourage more submissions.

meeting_summaries.transcript_preview:
Sarah: Week one results are in. Tom, walk us through the numbers.

Tom: Email campaign exceeded expectations. 31% open rate, up from our 24% target. Click-through is 4.8%.

Emma: Social media is performing well. Instagram ads at 3.8% CTR. TikTok is slightly lower at 2.9% but engagement is high.

Sarah: What about conversions?

Tom: Conversion rate is 2.1%. We're tracking to hit our $500K revenue target for Q4.

Emma: Influencer partnerships are working. Three of our five influencers have posted
